Class Control

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable

              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.Control
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnRender
Direct Known Subclasses:
Clickable, Label
public class Control
extends Widget
implements OnRender

A base class for control widgets.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Control

public Control(java.lang.String html)

Method Detail

get

public static Control get(Component e)

Gets the Control widget associated with a component.

If the specified component does not have an associated Control widget, this method will creates one based on that component and associate them.

Parameters:
e - A component that may have a Control widget based on it.
Returns:
The Control widget associated with e.
Since:
1.0

sub

protected static final <S extends Control,T extends S> void sub(S s,
                                                                T t,
                                                                Id<T> id)

Helps subclasses to cache the controls of a super type.

Parameters:
t - A control of a subclass.
s - A control of a superclass.
id - An Id for t to cache s.
Since:
1.0

init

protected void init()

Performs an action on the rendering event.

This method creates Pseudo widgets to associate the browser "focus" and "blur" events to the "focus" and "blur" pseudo selectors respectively over the underlying HTML element.

Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(Render evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method simply init() this widget and then stops listening to Render events.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnRender
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0
